name: Conditional order pronounced / granted (sole + joint)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

You have been granted a 'conditional order' by the court. Your conditional order was formally pronounced (read out) by a judge at ((court name)) on ((date of hearing)). Your ((partner)) has also been notified. 

You can read your conditional order by signing into your ((isDivorce??divorce)) account: ((signin url))

^((isDivorce??You are not divorced yet))((isDissolution??Your civil partnership has not been ended yet)). You still have to apply for a final order which will end the ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)).  You can apply for a final order from ((CO pronouncement date plus 43 days)). This will end your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)).

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Your conditional order has been granted
